value.title: StarCraft 2: Reynor's TERRAN vs MaxPax! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Reynor as Terran and MaxPax as Protoss. value.title: This is why SC2 isn’t played on 50% hit points | PiG's Lab - StarCraft 2

And best of all, Astrea and Cham have some clever solutions to this challenge! -- 🐷 Second Channel for Learning StarCraft 2: https://www.youtube.com/c/PiGRandom
